blocks.name: dnival
blocks.content: Value of the "distance to nearest integer" function. (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 4-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dnival(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(s0, c0, cr, c1, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c0)), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0))))
  fveq2d(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq12d(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0), cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), c0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  fvoveq1(cv(s0), c0, cfl, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  fvex(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c0))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c0))
  diff.cabs.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
  diff.cfl.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dnicld1
blocks.content: Closure theorem for the "distance to nearest integer" function. (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 4-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dnicld1(class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c0)), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
} = {
  abscld(co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c0), w0)
  subcld(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), c0, w0)
  recnd(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cr))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cr)))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cr))
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cr))
  halfre()
  readdcl(c0, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  reflcl(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
  recnd(c0, w0)
}

blocks.name: dnizeq0
blocks.content: The distance to nearest integer is zero for integers. (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 15-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dnizeq0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), nat0, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1))), wcel(c1, cr))
  dnival(s0, c1, c0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), nat0, cfv(cabs, nat0), w0)
  fveq2d(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), nat0, w0)
  eqtrd(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), nat0, co(c1, cmin, c1), w0)
  oveq1d(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1, c1, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), c1, co(c1, caddc, cfv(cfl, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(c1, caddc, cfv(cfl, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cr)))
  jca(w0, wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cr))
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cr))
  flzadd(c1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  eqtrd(co(c1, caddc, cfv(cfl, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), c1, co(c1, caddc, nat0), w0)
  oveq2d(c1, caddc, cfv(cfl, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), nat0, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cfl, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), nat0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), co(nat0, cico, nat1)))
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), co(nat0, cico, nat1)))
  mpbir(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), co(nat0, cico, nat1)), w3a(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), clt, nat1)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), clt, nat1))
  rexri(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  ltleii(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  0re()
  halfre()
  halfgt0()
  halflt1()
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), co(nat0, cico, nat1)), w3a(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), clt, nat1))), wa(wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(nat1, cxr)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(nat1, cxr))
  0xr()
  1xr()
  elico1(nat0, nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  ico01fl0(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  addid1d(c1, w0)
  subidd(c1, w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  zred(c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, nat0), nat0))
  abs0()
}

blocks.name: dnizphlfeqhlf
blocks.content: The distance to nearest integer is a half for half-integers. (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 15-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dnizphlfeqhlf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))), wcel(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cr))
  readdcld(c1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  dnival(s0, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), c0)
  fveq2d(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  mvrladdd(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  addcld(c1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cz))
  eqeltrd(co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cz, co(c1, caddc, nat1), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), co(c1, caddc, nat1), co(c1, caddc, co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), w0)
  addassd(c1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  zred(c1, w0)
  recnd(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  oveq2d(c1, caddc, co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), nat1, w0)
  2halvesd(nat1, w0)
  1cnd(w0)
  peano2zd(c1, w0)
  flid(co(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
  absidd(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cr))
  a1i(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
  ax-mp(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
  halfgt0()
  ltlei(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  0re()
  halfre()
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dnibndlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ dnibnd . (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 4-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dnibndlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), cle, c3), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), cmin, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2)))), cle, c3)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  breq1d(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), cle, c3, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), cmin, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2)))), w0)
  fveq2d(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2)), co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), cmin, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2))), w0)
  oveq12d(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1))), wcel(c1, cr))
  dnival(s0, c1, c0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2))), wcel(c2, cr))
  dnival(s0, c2, c0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm dnibndlem2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), cmin, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2)))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2))))
  letrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), cmin, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2)))), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cfv(cabs, co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2))), w0)
  abscld(co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), cmin, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2))), w0)
  subcld(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2)), w0)
  recnd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), w0)
  abscld(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), w0)
  recnd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2)), w0)
  abscld(co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), w0)
  abscld(co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2)), w0)
  subcld(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), w0)
  abs2difabsd(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), w0)
  eqbrtrrd(cfv(cabs, co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), w0)
  3eqtrd(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cfv(cabs, co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2))), cfv(cabs, co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1))), cfv(cabs, co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1))), w0)
  fveq2d(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2), co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(co(c1, cmin, c2), co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), w0)
  nnncan1d(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), c2, c1, w0)
  fveq2d(cabs, co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), co(co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1)), w0)
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), w0)
  oveq1d(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), w0)
  abssubd(co(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c2), co(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, c1), w0)
  subcld(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), c2, w0)
  eqeltrrd(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cc, cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), w0)

blocks.name: dnibnd
blocks.content: The "distance to nearest integer" function is 1-Lipschitz continuous, i.e., is a short map. (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 4-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dnibnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpjaodan(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2))), wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  dnibndlem13(s0, c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wcel(c2, cr))
  adantr(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wcel(c1, cr))
  simpr(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c2), cmin, cfv(c0, c1))), wa(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c1), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c2), cmin, cfv(c0, c1)))))
  abssubd(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), w0)
  recnd(cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  dnicld2(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  recnd(cfv(c0, c2), w0)
  dnicld2(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  breqtrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, c2), cmin, cfv(c0, c1))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))))
  dnibndlem13(s0, c0, c2, c1, wa(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wcel(c1, cr))
  adantr(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wcel(c2, cr))
  simpr(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2))))
  abssubd(c2, c1, w0)
  recnd(c2, w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  letrid(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cfl, co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cr))
  readdcld(c2, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  reflcl(co(c2, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cfl, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cr), wcel(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cr))
  readdcld(c1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cr))
  halfre()
  reflcl(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
}

blocks.name: dnicn
blocks.content: The "distance to nearest integer" function is continuous. (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 4-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dnicn(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, co(cr, ccncf, cr))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)))))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wf(c0, cr, cr), wral(hs1, cr, wral(hs3, crp, wrex(hs2, crp, wral(hs0, cr, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs3))))))))
  dnif(s0, c0)

  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wrex(hs2, crp, wral(hs0, cr, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs3))))), wcel(cv(hs3), crp), wral(hs0, cr, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs3)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cr, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs3)))
  lelttrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), cv(hs3), cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  abscld(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  recnd(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  resubcld(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  dnicld2(s0, c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  dnicld2(s0, c0, cv(hs1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  abscld(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  recnd(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  resubcld(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  rpred(cv(hs3), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3))))
  ad2antrr(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3)), wcel(cv(hs3), crp))

  simplll(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3)))
  simplr(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3)))
  simpr(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3)))
  rspceaimv(hs0, hs2, cv(hs3), crp, cr, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs3)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs3)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs2)))
  breq2(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt)
  mp2an(wb(wcel(c0, co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wa(wf(c0, cr, cr), wral(hs1, cr, wral(hs3, crp, wrex(hs2, crp, wral(hs0, cr, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs3))))))))), wss(cr, cc), wss(cr, cc))
  ax-resscn()
  elcncf2(hs1, hs3, hs2, hs0, cr, cr, c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs3), crp)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

thm knoppcnlem5(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0))): ℕ0 →(ℂ[↦]ℝ)))
  ⊣ c1 =(s2 ∈ ℝ ↦(abs `((⌊ `(s2[+](1[÷]2)))[-]s2)))
  ⊣ c0 =(s3 ∈ ℝ ↦(s4 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2[^]s4)[×](c1 `(((2[×]c3)[^]s4)[×]s3)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℕ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

} = {
  fmpttd(s0, cn0, (s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0)), (ℂ[↦]ℝ), w0)
  sylibr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0), (s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0))∈(ℂ[↦]ℝ), ((s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0)): ℝ → ℂ))
  fmpttd(s1, cr, ((c0 ` s1)` s0), cc, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0))

  knoppcnlem3(s2, s3, s4, c0, s1, s0, c1, c2, c3, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  ad2antrr(w0, s0 ∈ ℕ0, s1 ∈ ℝ, c3 ∈ ℕ)

  pm3.2i(ℂ ∈ 𝕌, ℝ ∈ 𝕌)
  cnex()

  elmapg(cc, universe, cr, universe, (s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0)))

  ⊣ c2 =(s3 ∈ ℝ ↦(abs `((⌊ `(s3[+](1[÷]2)))[-]s3)))
  ⊣ c0 =(s4 ∈ ℝ ↦(s5 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c3[^]s5)[×](c2 `(((2[×]c4)[^]s5)[×]s4)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℕ)

  ⊣ d(s2, c1)

  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(seq(0(oF(+),(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0)))))` c1)=(s2 ∈ ℝ ↦(seq(0(+,(c0 ` s2)))` c1))), c2 =(s3 ∈ ℝ ↦(abs `((⌊ `(s3[+](1[÷]2)))[-]s3))))
  a1ii((w0 →(seq(0(oF(+),(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0)))))` c1)=(s2 ∈ ℝ ↦(seq(0(+,(c0 ` s2)))` c1))), c0 =(s4 ∈ ℝ ↦(s5 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c3[^]s5)[×](c2 `(((2[×]c4)[^]s5)[×]s4))))))
  a1ii((w0 →(seq(0(oF(+),(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0)))))` c1)=(s2 ∈ ℝ ↦(seq(0(+,(c0 ` s2)))` c1))), (w0 → c4 ∈ ℕ))
  a1ii((w0 →(seq(0(oF(+),(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0)))))` c1)=(s2 ∈ ℝ ↦(seq(0(+,(c0 ` s2)))` c1))), (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ))
  seqof(s2, hs0, nat0, caddc, (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0))), c1, cr, (c0 ` s2), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ ∈ 𝕌)
  sylib(w0, c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 0), c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  elnn0uz(c1)
  fvmptd(s0, (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0))), hs0, (s2 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s2)` hs0)), cn0, (s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0)), universe, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(0[...]c1)))
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(0[...]c1)), (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0)))=(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0))))
  eqid((s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0))))

  a1i(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(0[...]c1))∧ s0 = hs0), (s1 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s1)` s0))=(s2 ∈ ℝ ↦((c0 ` s2)` s0)))
  cbvmptv(s1, s2, cr, ((c0 ` s1)` s0), ((c0 ` s2)` s0))

  mpteq2dv(s2, cr, ((c0 ` s2)` s0), ((c0 ` s2)` hs0), s0 = hs0)

thm knoppcld(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cc))

  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s3, cr, csu(s4, cn0, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s3)), cv(s4)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c4), clt, nat1))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)

  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)

  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

blocks.name: unblimceq0
blocks.content: If ` F ` is unbounded near ` A ` it has no limit at ` A ` . (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 12-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: unbdqndv1
blocks.content: If the difference quotient ` ( ( ( F `` z ) - ( F `` A ) ) / ( z - A ) ) ` is unbounded near ` A ` then ` F ` is not differentiable at ` A ` . (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 12-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm unbdqndv1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cdm(co(c1, cdv, c2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, cdif(c4, csn(c0)), co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c2, c0)), cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c4, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, crp, wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cdif(c4, csn(c0)), wa(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s3), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cabs, cfv(c3, cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)

thm unbdqndv1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2)))
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈(c4 \ { c0 })↦(((c2 ` s0)[-](c2 ` c0))[÷](s0[-]c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c4 → ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s3 ∈(c4 \ { c0 }),((abs `(s3[-]c0))[<]s2 ∧ s1[≤](abs `(c3 ` s3)))))))
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)

  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  pm2.01da(w0, c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2)))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))), ¬ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2)), ∀(hs0, ¬ c0[(c1[_D]c2)]hs0))

  intnand((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))), c0 ∈((int `((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c1))` c4), hs0 ∈(c3[limCC]c0))
  neleqtrrd(hs0, (c3[limCC]c0), emptycls, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))))
  a1i((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))), ¬ hs0 ∈ ∅)
  noel(hs0)
  unblimceq0(s1, s2, s3, c3, c0, (c4 \ { c0 }), (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))))
  ssdifssd(c4, { c0 }, cc, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))))
  fmptd(s0, c3, (c4 \ { c0 }), cc, (((c2 ` s0)[-](c2 ` c0))[÷](s0[-]c0)), (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))))

  sselda(c0, dom((c1[_D]c2)), c4, w0)

  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2)), ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s3 ∈(c4 \ { c0 }),((abs `(s3[-]c0))[<]s2 ∧ s1[≤](abs `(c3 ` s3)))))))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2)), (¬ c0[(c1[_D]c2)]hs0 ↔ ¬(c0 ∈((int `((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c1))` c4)∧ hs0 ∈(c3[limCC]c0))))
  notbid(w0, c0[(c1[_D]c2)]hs0, (c0 ∈((int `((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c1))` c4)∧ hs0 ∈(c3[limCC]c0)))

  notbid((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))), c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2)), ∃(hs0, c0[(c1[_D]c2)]hs0))

  a1i((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))), (∀(hs0, ¬ c0[(c1[_D]c2)]hs0)↔ ¬ ∃(hs0, c0[(c1[_D]c2)]hs0)))

  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ dom((c1[_D]c2))))
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c4, { c0 })
  diff.csn.s(s1, c0)

blocks.name: unbdqndv2
blocks.content: Variant of ~ unbdqndv1 with the hypothesis that ` ( ( ( F `` y ) - ( F `` x ) ) / ( y - x ) ) ` is unbounded where ` x <_ A ` and ` A <_ y ` . (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 12-May-2021.)

blocks.name: knoppndv
blocks.content: The continuous nowhere differentiable function ` W ` ( Knopp, K. (1918). Math. Z. 2, 1-26 ) is, in fact, nowhere differentiable. (Contributed by Asger C. Ipsen, 19-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm knoppndv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, c0)), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, cr, cmpt(s2, cn0, co(co(c3, cexp, cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(c1, co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c4), cexp, cv(s2)), cmul, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s3, cr, csu(s4, cn0, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cv(s4)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(cneg(nat1), cioo, nat1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat1, clt, co(c4, cmul, cfv(cabs, c3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c3)
  -| diffsc(s4, c4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
  -| diffsw(s4, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, c0)), emptycls), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(co(cr, cdv, c0))))))
  alrimiv(hs0, w0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(co(cr, cdv, c0)))))

thm knoppndv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → dom((ℝ[_D]c0))= ∅)

  ⊣ c2 =(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c3[^]s2)[×](c1 `(((2[×]c4)[^]s2)[×]s1)))))
  ⊣ c0 =(s3 ∈ ℝ ↦ sum(s4 ∈ ℕ0,((c2 ` s3)` s4)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(-u(1)[(,)]1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℕ)

  knoppndvlem22(hs1, hs2, s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, hs0, hs4, hs3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(hs3 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs4 ∈ ℝ+)))

thm knoppf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, cr, cr))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, cr, cmpt(s2, cn0, co(co(c3, cexp, cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(c1, co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c4), cexp, cv(s2)), cmul, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s3, cr, csu(s4, cn0, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cv(s4)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(cneg(nat1), cioo, nat1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cn))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
  -| diffsw(s4, w0)
} = {
  fmptd(s3, c0, cr, cr, csu(s4, cn0, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cv(s4))), w0)
  isumrecl(s4, cn0, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cv(s4)), nat0, cfv(c2, cv(s3)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)))
  nn0uz()
  0zd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)))
  eqidd(cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cv(s4)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)), wcel(cv(s4), cn0)))
  knoppcnlem3(s0, s1, s2, c2, cv(s3), cv(s4), c1, c3, c4, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)), wcel(cv(s4), cn0)))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)), wcel(cv(s4), cn0), wcel(c4, cn))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)), wcel(cv(s4), cn0), wcel(c3, cr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr), wcel(c3, cr))
  simpld(w0, wcel(c3, cr), wbr(cfv(cabs, c3), clt, nat1))
  knoppndvlem3(c3, w0)
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)), wcel(cv(s4), cn0), wcel(cv(s3), cr))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)), wcel(cv(s4), cn0))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)), wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cdm(cli)), wbr(cseq(nat0, caddc, cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cli, cfv(c0, cv(s3))))
  knoppndvlem4(s0, s1, s2, hs0, s4, c2, cv(s3), c0, c1, c3, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cr)))
  eqtri(c0, cmpt(hs0, cr, csu(s4, cn0, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s4)))), cmpt(s3, cr, csu(s4, cn0, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cv(s4)))))

blocks.name: cnndvlem2

thm cnndvlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, cv(s0))), emptycls)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cr, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfl, co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cmin, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s2, cr, cmpt(s3, cn0, co(co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cexp, cv(s3)), cmul, cfv(c0, co(co(co(nat2, cmul, nat3), cexp, cv(s3)), cmul, cv(s2)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s4, cr, csu(s5, cn0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s4)), cv(s5)))))
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsc(s5, c1)
} = {
  ax-mp(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, cv(s0))), emptycls))), wa(wcel(c2, co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, c2)), emptycls)))
  cnndvlem1(s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, c2, c0, c1)
  spcev(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c2, co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, c2)), emptycls)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, cv(s0))), emptycls)))
  eqeltri(c2, universe, cmpt(s4, cr, csu(s5, cn0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s4)), cv(s5)))))
  mptex(s4, cr, csu(s5, cn0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s4)), cv(s5))))
  reex()
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(c2, co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, c2)), emptycls))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c2, co(cr, ccncf, cr))
  eqeq1d(cdm(co(cr, cdv, cv(s0))), emptycls, cdm(co(cr, cdv, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  dmeqd(co(cr, cdv, cv(s0)), co(cr, cdv, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s0), c2, cr, cdv)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c2, co(cr, ccncf, cr)), wceq(cdm(co(cr, cdv, c2)), emptycls))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, co(cr, ccncf, cr))
  diff.co.s(s0, cr, ccncf, cr)
  diff.ccncf.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cdm(co(cr, cdv, c2)), emptycls)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, co(cr, cdv, c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, cr, cdv, c2)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cdv.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s4)
}

thm cnndvlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0,(s0 ∈(ℝ[-cn->]ℝ)∧ dom((ℝ[_D]s0))= ∅))
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(abs `((⌊ `(s1[+](1[÷]2)))[-]s1)))
  ⊣ c1 =(s2 ∈ ℝ ↦(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(((1[÷]2)[^]s3)[×](c0 `(((2[×]3)[^]s3)[×]s2)))))
  ⊣ c2 =(s4 ∈ ℝ ↦ sum(s5 ∈ ℕ0,((c1 ` s4)` s5)))
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s4, c1)
  ⊣ d(s5, c1)
} = {
  ax-mp(∃(s0,(s0 ∈(ℝ[-cn->]ℝ)∧ dom((ℝ[_D]s0))= ∅)), (c2 ∈(ℝ[-cn->]ℝ)∧ dom((ℝ[_D]c2))= ∅))
  cnndvlem1(s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, c2, c0, c1)
  spcev(s0, c2, (c2 ∈(ℝ[-cn->]ℝ)∧ dom((ℝ[_D]c2))= ∅), (s0 ∈(ℝ[-cn->]ℝ)∧ dom((ℝ[_D]s0))= ∅))
  eqeltri(c2, universe, (s4 ∈ ℝ ↦ sum(s5 ∈ ℕ0,((c1 ` s4)` s5))))
  mptex(s4, cr, sum(s5 ∈ ℕ0,((c1 ` s4)` s5)))
  reex()
  anbi12d(s0 = c2, s0 ∈(ℝ[-cn->]ℝ), dom((ℝ[_D]s0))= ∅, c2 ∈(ℝ[-cn->]ℝ), dom((ℝ[_D]c2))= ∅)
  eleq1(s0, c2, (ℝ[-cn->]ℝ))
  eqeq1d(dom((ℝ[_D]s0)), emptycls, dom((ℝ[_D]c2)), s0 = c2)
  dmeqd((ℝ[_D]s0), (ℝ[_D]c2), s0 = c2)
  oveq2(s0, c2, cr, cdv)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c2 ∈(ℝ[-cn->]ℝ), dom((ℝ[_D]c2))= ∅)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, (ℝ[-cn->]ℝ))
  diff.co.s(s0, cr, ccncf, cr)
  diff.ccncf.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, dom((ℝ[_D]c2)), emptycls)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, (ℝ[_D]c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, cr, cdv, c2)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cdv.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s4)
}
